channel.title: [UK] UCAS univercity application '09
channel.description:
for 17-18 year olds who are applying to univercites. post which ones you applied to, your subject and the outcome.
if you applied to oxbridge, also post the college.
I've applied to
Robinson college, Cambridge Imperial College UCL Edinburgh Leeds
to study natural sciences at cambridge, and physics everywhere else.
I've been rejected from cambridge, have an offer from edinburgh, and an interview at imperial college and UCL.

item.title: [UK] UCAS univercity application '09
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Taios, post:13, topic:255744”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=337912.msg2624227#msg2624227 date=1231678500]

Sure, it varies slightly though depending on what table you use though.

Southampton, edin, york i think are in top 10 in all i’ve seen although edinburgh you have to do an extra year because its a Scottish university…but the place is beautiful, i stayed up there for a week with my mate…

Gimmie two mins to post it

EDIT HERE
I went to see lancester though, they were pretty entusiastic but the campus looked shit…they had loadsa construction going on though.

http://browse.guardian.co.uk/education?SearchBySubject=false&FirstRow=0&SortOrderDirection=&SortOrderColumn=GuardianTeachingScore&Subject=Computer+sciences+and+IT&Go=Go

And the other one
http://extras.timesonline.co.uk/tol_gug/gooduniversityguide.php?subject=COMPUTER
They’ll be updated in a few weeks for 2010.

What AS levels you doin? + what kinda uni’s you have an idea of?

Physics, Maths, Computing and Philosophy, no idea whether I will drop any at A level. Haven’t looked at any unis yet, probably will be mostly looking at the ones in the immidiate area near where I’m living now.

im currently only doing three, physics, maths and IT i was doing further maths but i had to drop it as it isnt actually timetabled and conflicted with IT alot. So im taking that AS next year when i do my A2’s

Cool =)
Furthermaths AS is real easy =)
Im not even doing computing a level lol
Maths, furthermaths, English literature/Language, Chemistry.

what in the name of god possessed you to take english ?
[/quote]

English is vital for understanding and getting along with all people from all backgrounds. It incorporates history, psychology, philosophy, whilst maintaning a subject all on its own.

I enjoy it :), the story writing and persuasive writing side of it mostly…and its a useful subject =p.[/quote]
i like the story writing side of it, was the only thing i enjoyed doing in year 11 but was too much other stuff mixed in there and oh yeah i can’t spell to save my life

Read full topic

item.title: [UK] UCAS univercity application '09
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:12, topic:255744”]GO SCOTLAND UNI’S! FREE ACCOMODATION FOR ME CUZ I HAS GOT SCOT BLOOD BLUD.

good luck to all of you in getting in. I’ll be applying next year. No idea where though, or what to do.[/quote]All my dads family are scottish? Does that mean i’ll get free stuff?

[quote=“sanga282, post:11, topic:255744”][quote author=Taios link=topic=337912.msg2624178#msg2624178 date=1231673249]

Sure, it varies slightly though depending on what table you use though.

Southampton, edin, york i think are in top 10 in all i’ve seen although edinburgh you have to do an extra year because its a Scottish university…but the place is beautiful, i stayed up there for a week with my mate…

Gimmie two mins to post it

EDIT HERE
I went to see lancester though, they were pretty entusiastic but the campus looked shit…they had loadsa construction going on though.

http://browse.guardian.co.uk/education?SearchBySubject=false&FirstRow=0&SortOrderDirection=&SortOrderColumn=GuardianTeachingScore&Subject=Computer+sciences+and+IT&Go=Go

And the other one
http://extras.timesonline.co.uk/tol_gug/gooduniversityguide.php?subject=COMPUTER
They’ll be updated in a few weeks for 2010.

What AS levels you doin? + what kinda uni’s you have an idea of?

Physics, Maths, Computing and Philosophy, no idea whether I will drop any at A level. Haven’t looked at any unis yet, probably will be mostly looking at the ones in the immidiate area near where I’m living now.

im currently only doing three, physics, maths and IT i was doing further maths but i had to drop it as it isnt actually timetabled and conflicted with IT alot. So im taking that AS next year when i do my A2’s

Cool =)
Furthermaths AS is real easy =)
Im not even doing computing a level lol
Maths, furthermaths, English literature/Language, Chemistry.
[/quote]
what in the name of god possessed you to take english ? ;)[/quote]

English is vital for understanding and getting along with all people from all backgrounds. It incorporates history, psychology, philosophy, whilst maintaning a subject all on its own.

I enjoy it :), the story writing and persuasive writing side of it mostly…and its a useful subject =p.

item.title: [UK] UCAS univercity application '09
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“yakman, post:1, topic:255744”]for 17-18 year olds who are applying to univercites.
post which ones you applied to, your subject and the outcome.

if you applied to oxbridge, also post the college.

I’ve applied to

Robinson college, Cambridge
Imperial College
UCL
Edinburgh
Leeds

to study natural sciences at cambridge, and physics everywhere else.

I’ve been rejected from cambridge, have an offer from edinburgh, and an interview at imperial college and UCL.[/quote]
York
Warwick
Edinburgh
Sheffield
Southampton

Ive been accepted too all of em except edinburgh i’m awaiting for a reply.,i only sent my ucas off like a week before christmas.

Dont worry bout cambridge…my mate got straight A*'s and over 95% in all exams…and hes got 5A’s at AS and predicted 5 A’s for a level…

He got declined.

All are in top 10 for computer science in country(edinburgh, soton, york = top 5 =) ) :)…I kinda wish i chose UCL instead of Sheffield though, they both only wanted ABB…but i wanted a more peaceful place, not busy london…but now i realize its the only place in the whole country my mum wont move to lol.

Read full topic
